metadata.Title: CVE-2016-1685 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
core/fxge/ge/fx_ge_text.cpp in PDFium, as used in Google Chrome before 51.0.2704.63, miscalculates certain index values, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read) via a crafted PDF document.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-1685` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

chromium-browser - 51.0.2704.79-0ubuntu0.16.04.1.1242
chromium-browser-l10n - 51.0.2704.79-0ubuntu0.16.04.1.1242
chromium-chromedriver - 51.0.2704.79-0ubuntu0.16.04.1.1242
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg - 51.0.2704.79-0ubuntu0.16.04.1.1242
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg-extra - 51.0.2704.79-0ubuntu0.16.04.1.1242
No subscription required

criterions.comment: chromium-browser package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '51.0.2704.79-0ubuntu0.16.04.1.1242').
